attributes.action: Direct tax inspectors to apply the same rules to MP's unvouched expenses as to other people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs have not been required to provide receipts when claiming expenses.  Although this is now to change, the Prime Minister is asked to instruct tax inspectors to carry out strict tax audits of expense reimbursements made to MPS for the past 6 years and treat as income any  payments made to them for which they fail to produce expense receipts, just as they have the power to do for any other person who pays income tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
